Articles.Content:
Can't take a screenshot for some odd reason, but essentially what has happened is after attempting to save a workspace or a craft (seriously, what the hell is the difference between the two names I set?)  A message pops up that said something about "VAB still loading". I thought it was odd. Now, I've tried to click launch and it comes up with "Already Launching".  Not sure if this is the one others have had, or not. Either way, a couple hours in the VAB lost

Good god, just tried to leave the VAB but I'm still in there. Music has changed, but I am very much so in the VAB.
Cant say its exactly like your problem but sometimes, well most of the time actually the launch button in the VAB wont work at all.
